that's a good idea with the fast sweep..but not fair to ignore people files=
 just because the sweep is slowers...it's like saying do it my way or it's =
not right... don't do=C2=A0 super fast sweep however I set it so you only h=
ear tibits of a station..so no full words

--- On Tue, 2/1/11, Urkel23 <urk=
el23@...> wrote:


From: Urkel23 <urkel23@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] R=
e: Steve's Box #43
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, February 1, 2=
011, 6:51 PM


=C2=A0 




I always keep the sweep at a very fast pace, mos=
t don't like it like that. I trained myself to listen that way, i never get=
 questioned by the skeptics.

If you hear a voice that's crystal clear, it'=
s most likely just radio. The communication doesn't come over that way usua=
lly.

I would suggest a test for anybody on this forum. Set you ghost box a=
t a super fast rate, then just sit back and listen. After a while you will =
hear them talk, but you have to get used to listening that way.

I feel tha=
t it's the only legitimate way to do this. Just my opinion on that topic. I=
f i hear someone's file with a slow sweep, i ignore it as communication for=
 the most part.

-Steve

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Adriana Jones" <a=
drianamjones@...> wrote:
>
> On your FM 
> at second 10-12 I hear "telephon=
e" and a fainter "hello?" I've gotten one or two "telephone-hello" voices m=
yself. Very interesting. 
> 
> at about second 18 "you're/its so beautiful"=
 a high soft female voice, I've gotten this message before and have also no=
ticed it on others' files too. These along with the "I love you"s are a goo=
d sign to hear, it means whoever is on the other side is feeling happy righ=
t now.
> 
> around sec 33-35 a man says quickly "I've paid a bit cause of y=
ou"
> 
> sec 42-43 "wait, just come" harmonic/singing higher pitch
> 
> sec=
 44-45 "the people are talking to me" also harmonic/singing higher pitch, I=
 think in response to the message at sec 42-43
> 
> sec 46-48 "you must do =
it"
>

>

1:02 there's the "I love you" :)
> 
> there are so many more communications=
 just on your FM sample, but some are too quick/blurry to decipher quickly,=
 but there are definitely way many more!
> 
> AM sample:
> 
> wow, I hear s=
o much am not sure what's communication and what's just radio, I'm also not=
 used to listening to am... what's the sweep speed, will it be possible for=
 any full words to come through at all? If not, then you've got a heck of a=
 lot of stuff going on... I heard something about obama twice and have only=
 listened through about half of it.
